This is a line from a Dilbert comicstrip: 
"When did ignorance become a point of view?"
If you want to talk with people, who know what 
you are talking about, you should maybe join a 
different group. I joined this group to discuss 
and read about samurai history, which is in and
of itself a somewhat academic topic. A certain
measure of education might proof to be useful in
this, whether your parents paid or you yourself.
Regards,
Max
